titles.title: Veterans Burial Benefits Improvement Act of 2003
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase burial benefits for veterans, and for other purposes.
Veterans Burial Benefits Improvement Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: Veterans Burial Benefits Improvement Act of 2003 - Increases the authorized allowance for burial and funeral expenses for deceased veterans who: (1) at the time of death were in receipt of veterans' disability compensation or veterans' pension benefits; or (2) were veterans of any war or were discharged or released from active military service for a service-connected disability and for whom there is no next of kin or sufficient resources to cover funeral and burial costs.Increases the burial plot allowance for veterans who, at the time of death, were receiving hospital or nursing home care in or through the Department of Veterans Affairs.Authorizes the annual adjustment of such allowances based on increases in the Consumer Price Index.
